name: Parachute
overview: Free conversion based on the Atari classic "Parachute".Our mission is to reach the base avoiding all the dangers that lie in wait for us: helicopters, birds, antiaircraft batteries, explosive balloons, guardians, traps, etc.You will be thrown in different scenarios and with the sole help of your parachute you will have to arrive safely at the end of your mission.You have Fuel, which helps you descend faster, but be careful, the fuel runs out, you must manage it wisely. In some places you can refuel.Luck! You will need it.
